articles.title: Dariq Whitehead has surgery on foot, expected to be back in fall for Duke Blue Devils men's basketball team
articles.description: Duke men's basketball's unfortunate history of significant foot injuries continued this week when top recruit Dariq Whitehead underwent surgery Tuesday to repair a fracture in his right foot.

articles.title: 'Here to play my best everyday,' Rafael Nadal begins long-awaited US Open run with four-set victory
